modName: Underground hideout mod with dragonborn followers
summary:
This mod Adds in to the game 1 hideout, 3 followers and 3 new weapons (Axemacesword, Nailing trucheon and DoubleNailball) the 2 of them are maces and the 1 is a warhammer
the hideout is located nearby the Riverwood (it's marked) and there are the 3 followers that have decided to follow your orders to clear the Skyrim from dragons and evil
descriptionHtml:
This mod Adds in to the game 1 hideout, 3 followers and 3 new weapons (Axemacesword, Nailing trucheon and DoubleNailball) the 2 of them are maces and the 1 is a warhammer
the hideout is located nearby the Riverwood (it's marked) and there are the 3 followers that have decided to follow your orders to clear the Skyrim from dragons and evil things.

this is my 1st mod for Skyrim so, please have fun!
author: giannis196
